extendedInfo.description: Have you ever screamed out loud (or in your head), âCan I Poop in Peace?âIf so, this app is for you!You can record your own version of the saying, âCan I Poop in Peaceâ or you can just use this app as a free voice recorder and share the audio files with your friends. -----Book Description:When children are around, what was once a private time has become just another busy moment in a parentâs day. Be warned, once a member of your household reads this hilarious book, you will start hearing âCan I Poop in Peace?â from all corners of your home. And be careful letting kids read this book. They just may want to read it over, and over, and over again. -----Do D. is the pseudonym for an award winning childrenâs book author. Do D. is a parent. Do D. just may be your neighbor. All profits from the sale of the book Can I Poop in Peace? will be donated to charity. Share your story on twitter: @CanIPoopinPeace

reviews.title: Brilliant!
reviews.comment: Ironically, I had larengitis when I downloaded the app. The prerecorded option was perfect to play for the kids!
